feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens, commas, and quotation marks similarly in terms of placement and frequency.

overall.explanation: Considering the alignment in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and lack of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
